Class PercolationStats

java.lang.Object
  PercolationStats

public class PercolationStats
extends java.lang.Object

Author:
Radovan Masaryk Percolation statistics. This class executes series of percolation runs and provides statistical methods to describe achieved results such as sample mean, sample standard deviation and 95% confidence interval.

Constructor Summary
PercolationStats(int N, int T)
          Creates PercolationStats object to find N*N 2D grid percolation system threshold probability.
 
Method Summary

          What is the higher bound of the 95% confidence interval of threshold probability?

Constructor Detail

PercolationStats

public PercolationStats(int N,
                        int T)
Creates PercolationStats object to find N*N 2D grid percolation system threshold probability. Statistical data are gathered after T rounds of execution.

Parameters:
N - the size of N*N 2D grid
T - the number of runs
